00310

00333 BOOLEAN PickABoxer( void )
00334 {
00335       UINT32                              uiLoop;
00336       SOLDIERTYPE *           pBoxer;
00337 
00338       for( uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < NUM_BOXERS; uiLoop++ )
00339       {
00340             if ( gubBoxerID[ uiLoop ] != NOBODY )
00341             {
00342                   if ( gfBoxerFought[ uiLoop ] )
00343                   {
00344                         // pathetic attempt to prevent multiple AI boxers
00345                         MercPtrs[ gubBoxerID[ uiLoop ] ]->uiStatusFlags &= ~SOLDIER_BOXER;
00346                   }
00347                   else 
00348                   {
00349                         pBoxer = MercPtrs[ gubBoxerID[ uiLoop ] ];
00350                         // pick this boxer!
00351                         if ( pBoxer->bActive && pBoxer->bInSector && pBoxer->bLife >= OKLIFE )
00352                         {
00353                               pBoxer->uiStatusFlags |= SOLDIER_BOXER;
00354                               SetSoldierNonNeutral( pBoxer );
00355                               RecalculateOppCntsDueToNoLongerNeutral( pBoxer );
00356                               CancelAIAction( pBoxer, TRUE );
00357                               RESETTIMECOUNTER( pBoxer->AICounter, 0 ); 
00358                               gfBoxerFought[ uiLoop ] = TRUE;
00359                               // improve stats based on the # of rests these guys have had
00360                               pBoxer->bStrength = __min( 100, pBoxer->bStrength += gubBoxersRests * 5 );
00361                               pBoxer->bDexterity = __min( 100, pBoxer->bDexterity + gubBoxersRests * 5 );
00362                               pBoxer->bAgility = __min( 100, pBoxer->bAgility + gubBoxersRests * 5 );
00363                               pBoxer->bLifeMax = __min( 100, pBoxer->bLifeMax + gubBoxersRests * 5 );
00364                               // give the 3rd boxer martial arts 
00365                               if ( (uiLoop == NUM_BOXERS - 1) && pBoxer->ubBodyType == REGMALE )
00366                               {
00367                                     pBoxer->ubSkillTrait1 = MARTIALARTS;
00368                               }
00369                               return( TRUE );
00370                         }
00371                   }
00372             }
00373       }
00374 
00375       return( FALSE );
00376 }

00459       {
00460             // boxer stepped out of the ring!
